sentences.en: As an aesthete, Wilde tried to blur the boundary between art and life.
sentences.cn: 作为一名忠实的唯美主义者, 王尔德一直努力想要模糊艺术和生活之间的界限.

sentences.en: It argues that the Humanity SpirIt'should involve Truth, Goodness, Aesthete and Freedom.
sentences.cn: 人文精神具体应该包括真 、 善 、 美、自由四个向度.

sentences.en: Lv - Ying ( 1915 - 1969 ) is a contemporary literary critic, an aesthete as well as a translator.
sentences.cn: 吕荧 ( 1915 -- 1969 ),当代文艺理论家 、 美学家、翻译家.

sentences.en: Nobody will deny that Wilde is an outstanding aesthete.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，王尔德是一位杰出的唯美主义者。

sentences.en: She has played both a religious aesthete who abandons all possessions, as well as a serial killer, and her first starring role in “Aap Kaa Surroor- The Real Luv Story”.
sentences.cn: 她饰演一个抛弃所有财产的严谨的审美家，同时还是个连环杀手；她第一次担任主演是在“真爱的故事”。

words.tran_cn: 美的；美学的；审美的，具有审美趣味的
审美的；美学的；有审美感的

trans.tran_en: someone who loves and understands beautiful things, such as art and music
